import React from "react"; import Projectnav from "./Projectnav"; class Calculator extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { currInput: "0", secondInput: "", calcHistory: "", }; } onCalcButtonPress = (e) => { let calcButtonValue = e.target.value; let newInput = `${this.state.currInput}` + calcButtonValue - "0"; let secondInput = this.state.currInput; e.preventDefault(); switch (calcButtonValue) { case "1": case "2": case "3": case "4": case "5": case "6": case "7": case "8": case "9": case "0": case ".": this.setState({ currInput: newInput, }); break; case "+": case "-": case "/": case "*": this.setState({ currInput: newInput, }); break; case "AC": this.setState({ currInput: "0", secondInput : '' }); break; } }; render() { return (

Simple Calculator


{this.state.secondInput}

{this.state.currInput}





); } } export default Calculator;
